Submodules

pyfemtet.opt.prediction.base module

class pyfemtet.opt.prediction.base.PredictionModelBase[ソース]

ベースクラス: ABC

abstract fit(x: ndarray, y: ndarray)[ソース]
パラメータ:

  • x (np.ndarray) – Input. (Point number) rows and (variable number) columns.

  • y (np.ndarray) – Output. (Point number) rows and (objective number) columns.

abstract predict(x: ndarray) → tuple[ndarray, ndarray][ソース]
パラメータ:

x (np.ndarray) – Input. (Point number) rows and (variable number) columns.

戻り値:

(Point number) rows and (objective number) columns. Index 0 is mean and index 1 is std.

戻り値の型:

np.ndarray

fit(x: ndarray, y: ndarray)[ソース]
パラメータ:

パラメータ:
